title: Chart
description: This schema defines the Chart entity. Charts are built using tables or sql queries by analyzing the data. Charts can be part of Dashboard.

chartType.description: This schema defines the type used for describing different types of charts.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies a chart instance.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Chart. It could be title or label from the source services.

fullyQualifiedName.description: A unique name that identifies a dashboard in the format 'ServiceName.ChartName'.

description.description: Description of the dashboard, what it is, and how to use it.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

chartUrl.description: Chart URL, pointing to its own Service URL.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

tables.description: Link to table used in this chart.

service.description: Link to service where this dashboard is hosted in.

serviceType.description: Service type where this chart is hosted in.

usageSummary.description: Latest usage information for this database.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
